text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ……So, to liven up the Appreciation Festival, King proposed something that flashy, huh？

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: Yep. King has her eyes on a dream. No matter the event, that her cheers will bestow power upon those involved, that kind of dream.

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: In addition to that――

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: King-san！ I was able to increase my stride by 3cm！ A new personal best. With this, there's no doubt that the real thing will be a ringing success！！

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: ……for the sake of my precious roommate. I'm prepared to do whatever it takes.

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: But that's probably why King will hesitate to rely on me even in the most crucial moments.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: …… Ahー…… so that's why.

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: Fufuu. After all, you wouldn't want the person that looks up to you to hear about your uncool parts, right?

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: That's why, just in case, if King starts to lose sight of her goal, I'd like you to help her out. I'm counting on you♪

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Today is a "Cheer Practice Session". On the day of the Appreciation Festival, it won't be just the school's Cheer Squad. We'll also need to include the spectators as well.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: To that end, the Cheerleading Squad has been given an opportunity. We've gotten permission to invite fans to participate in our practice sessions――

text_block_list.name: Participating Fan A
text_block_list.text: Um, excuse me. I want to head to the course, would you happen to know the way？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ah, no problem！ You're participating in the practice session, right！？ I can lead you there！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: （We can only hold 2 practice sessions before the event. I will use both of these practice days to master it all, so when the day comes――）

text_block_list.name: Festival Fans
text_block_list.text: Hurray！ Hurray！ Tr-a-ce-n！ Fight Fight Uma Musume！ Go！！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: As expected of a first-class Cheer Captain……！Because of King-san's cheering, I was able to break a Tracen Academy record and take 1st place！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Fufuun, without fail, King will―― make this work！！

text_block_list.name: Participating Fan A
text_block_list.text: Ooh～…… so this is where we'll be practicing～. So we don't lose to the Uma Musume, we need to be loud！

text_block_list.name: Participating Fan B
text_block_list.text: Ufufuu, I brought the megaphone I used last year with me！ It'll be great if we can make this year's cheering as wonderful as last year's！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Looks like everyone is here！ Well then, let's get right to it. So we can provide the best cheers―― Come on！

text_block_list.name: Participating Fan C
text_block_list.text: Ooh～, what an impressive note……！ Hmm！？ That trumpeter, I think I've seen them on TV before！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Oo-ho ho ho！ I hired a first-class brass band for the sake of today！ A King will use their connections to make use of everything they can！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Alright, everyone！ Make sure to liven this up as grandly and vociferously as possible！ For those of you gathered here, I'll grant you the privilege of basking in this King's aura！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ………… Once again, King is………

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: After preparing all of this, failure is unthinkable. Starting with the first practice session, there's no mistaking it'll be a resounding success！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Everyone, let's match up with the trumpet and do it one more time！ One, two！！
(Various whistles, clicks, drums, and voices)

text_block_list.name: Participating Fan A
text_block_list.text: R-right now……did it seem like our voices were synched……？

text_block_list.name: Participating Fan B
text_block_list.text: Yeah…… maybe……？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: O-of course they were！ It was a reeeeally rousing cheer！ Oo-ho ho ho, we'll continue on with this！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……and. With this！！
(Pyuuu～～…… Hyurururu～……)

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: So many pretty balloons, there they go, up in to the sky……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: When it comes to cheering, it's gotta be this, according to the internet！ Alright, it really makes you want to let your voices be heard, right！？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Alright, cry out to your heart's content！ Fight Oー！！

text_block_list.name: Participating Fan C
text_block_list.text: F-fight Oー……？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Right! Fiー……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Cough, cough！ Cough！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: …… King！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hey. Let's take a break for now. I know how you want to keep working hard but, from the start you've been going full throttle with your voice……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: We can't yet. After all, we haven't even been able to liven things up at all……！ As the leader, I need to pull everyone up along with me, I just need to liven everything up……！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eh？ Where are you going！？ W-wait！？ King！？
(JyaAAAAnn！！)

text_block_list.name: Participating Fans
text_block_list.text: W-what's going on……！？ Spotlights……！？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Everyone, let's try going at it with a groove feeling！！ Everyone, put your hands up！！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eeeeeeeeeh！？ Again, without telling anyone, you prepared something weird……！

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Stoooooop right there！！ Making this racket and these flashy lights are against the rules！！

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Members & Fans
text_block_list.text: Good workー. Good work everyoneー…… Good work everyoneー！

text_block_list.name: Fan Carrying a Fan B
text_block_list.text: ……somehow, today was kind of exhausting, wasn't it？

text_block_list.name: Participating Fan A
text_block_list.text: Well, it was the first meeting after all…… I wonder if we'll be fine for the real thing～.

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: ………… King, good work. What are you going to do about tonight's practice？ If you wanna iron out some of the issues from today, I'll help out！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……Ah, well.

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member A
text_block_list.text: Haa…… I messed up during the dance and call……

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member C
text_block_list.text: ……you have your normal practice tomorrow too. Let's take it easy so the fatigue doesn't build up.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……No, it's fine. I'm sure everyone is exhausted from today already.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Next time, let's make it a success！ Well then, everyone, see you tomorrow！

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: That's why, just in case, if King starts to lose sight of her goal, I'd like you to help her out. I'm counting on you♪

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …………If that was the real thing.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: The cheering is…… so dreadfully flimsy～！？

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Haa…… in the end, nobody was cheering for me…… For some reason…… I feel so faint……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ――Don't let it get to you, King. We'll definitely liven things up with our cheering！ What are you gonna do if just failing once or twice gets you down？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I need to properly lead everyone. I need to take the vanguard, stand out, and help raise everyone's spirit……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I know, I'll prepare a giant electronic billboard！ With that, I can show them the timing for the cheer！ And then play music――

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ……King, taking a late night stroll, too?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Nature-san……？

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: In that case, how about joining me for a bit？ There's a nice breeze tonightー

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: …………C'mon, let's go. King.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Let's go broaden our horizons.
